Name: Toilet Flushing Simulator
About the game: TOILET FLUSHING SIMULATOR IS THE PERFECT GAME FOR EVERYONE Toilet Flush Sim is a ground-breaking, revolutionary, absolute masterpiece of artwork that has been gifted to the world by god himself! The game includes many amazing features such as: - Flushing a toilet! - Flushing objects down a toilet! - Buying Toilets! - Buying objects to flush down the toilet! With an astonishing 10 whole toilets, you could be playing this game for honestly probably only like 30 minutes before you have got everything. BUT THAT'S OKAY BECAUSE EVERYTHING IN THE GAME IS JUST SO AMAZING YOU WILL BE PLAYING FOR DAYS! On top of that more content is being added including, more toilets, more flushables and even a whole new game mode was added so keep an eye on the patch notes cause you never know whats coming next! If you expect anything more then flushing toilets you may be very disappointed.
